Name: Ruin
Desc:
Summons an ancient sword of annihilation to devastate the surroundings.
Does not affect enemies in the Damage Reflection status.

H.Old:
MP Cost: 1000. Attacks up to 15 enemies
activates 12 times to deal 500% damage 6 times when summoned.
After being summoned, the sword stabs the ground to attack 8 times and inflicts 900% damage 9 times.
Cooldown: 60 sec.
H.New:
MP Cost: 1000. Attacks up to 15 enemies.
Activates 12 attacks when summoned that attack at 500% Damage 6 times.
After being summoned, the sword stabs the ground and activate 8 attacks that attack at 900% Damage 9 times.
Cooldown: 60 sec.
